name: Progressive 26min Climb
description:
Today, two climbs of 26 minutes in duration, but each one is climbed using a different cadence. But as the power ramps up between steps, you self select your cadence before returning to the set cadence. 



Position yourself on the bike as you would on a long climb. Like a climb outdoors, the required power will increase throughout the 26 minutes. We culminate with a 1 min above threshold at the top of the climb.
